game_name: If You Are Not Dumb - Puzzle Experiences in VR & MR
game_description: Simplest looking Puzzles Experiences to blow you mind.. and may be make you feel dumb. Each puzzle with its own logic. Puzzle examples: * Extinguish fire when there is no water * Type without any keyboard * Hide from the eyes that see everything * Sunset?? But where is the sun??? Sounds interesting? BUT this game is not recommended * If You are dumb * And you are sure about that Ready to test your dumb levels? ** Supports Mixed Reality TUK
review_1: So I thought I'd give this game a go and wow, it's pretty good. The puzzle mechanics are done really well and do work. The puzzles are fiendish, but some of them you will kick yourself when you finally get them. So use the functionality of the headset in genius ways. But some are very very hard.... or maybe I'm not as smart as I would like. Pros: Easy to pick up Clear graphics Hints available Cons: Some puzzles so hard it made me want to cry On the fence: Microtransations more Hints. I'm not marking this down for this as the developer is trying to make this work, but maybe if there was a say of earning more.. i.e. for every 5 you do on your own you get another? But impressive first impressions. Keep up the good work.

review_3: An interesting puzzle game with some good ideas, but not all levels are logical or to solve without hint. And its too short. I played all levels in about 30 min. More levels please.
review_4: Dev is da goat he help me make iq haigher with this game
